location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche at Bussora (Basra)

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged with a large section of text missing in its top right corner.

mods.abstract: Letter states that the Bombay Grabis now on its way to Bushire. Letter discusses several administrative and financial issues. Shipped by the Bombay Grab.
